text: Cicely Louise Tyson (December 19, 1924 - January 28, 2021) was an American actress. She played Sipsey in the comedic-drama movie Fried Green Tomatoes (1991),Barbara Tepa Lupack, Literary Adaptations in Black American Cinema (Rochester, NY: University of Rochester Press, 2002), p. 383 and played Mamma Kay in the movie The Haunting in Georgia (2013). She also played Carrie Grace Battle in the television series Sweet Justice. Tyson was born in New York City. She died on January 28, 2021 in New York City at the age of 96. ==Notes== ==Reference== Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Models from New York City Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Cicely Tyson
